name: ContinuousAndBilevelPositiveAirwayPressure
title: Continuous and Bilevel Positive Airway Pressure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this ICD10PCS value set is to represent concepts for Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP) and and Bilevel Positive Airway Pressure (BPAP) procedures),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP) and and Bilevel Positive Airway Pressure (BPAP) procedures),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
